document_data.mainbody:
Hosgerd Lar was a contractor who connected hirings with adventurers in need of help in the town of Eveningstar in the 15 century DR.
Hosgerd was a dwarvish woman with a light skin tone, short blonde hair and clean-shaven face. She wore dress adorned with furs.
In the 15 century DR, Hosgerd Lar could be seen dealing with adventurers from the world of Eberron, who set out to investigate the nearby ruins of the Haunted Halls.
